survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Smart Home Device Integration Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and challenges related to integrating smart home devices into their daily lives.

questions.question_text: Which of the following smart home devices do you currently own? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Smart Speaker (e.g., Amazon Echo, Google Home)
questions.client_notes: Consider adding an 'Other' option for devices not listed.

script.question_text: Which of the following smart home devices do you currently own? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Smart Speaker (e.g., Amazon Echo, Google Home)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the integration between your smart home devices?
answer_options: Not applicable (I only own one smart device)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 does not include 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the integration between your smart home devices?
answer_options: Not applicable (I only own one smart device)
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 does not include 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when integrating smart home devices?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 does not include 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Include an open-ended 'Other' option for detailed feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when integrating smart home devices?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 does not include 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in a service that helps integrate and manage all your smart home devices?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 does not include 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: This question gauges potential market interest in integration services.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in a service that helps integrate and manage all your smart home devices?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 does not include 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in smart home device integration?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who own at least one smart device
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights.

script.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in smart home device integration?
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who own at least one smart device
